WorkItem.ClosedComment: Only libraries without module dependencies are able to use this approach in a general fashion. We don't think this is a likely use case for TypeScript programs.
WorkItem.Description: Why not support [Universal Module Definition](https://github.com/umdjs/umd)? Then you don't have to worry about whether you output CommonJS or AMD; the modules will work for both. I've seen several general purpose libraries already supporting it.
